title: disconnect and lose ranked placement
body: Dear riot, seen you are busying in Barcelona for All-Stars and your sever going to fk us, the players. My game was frozen while in the loading game as my partner as well.. we have to restart the computer, but they  vote to remake.. not only 1 games .. it twice in same time.... please help us !

replies.body:
I can't find any records of server issues, additionally, server issues are *extremely unlikely* to cause your PC to freeze. Most of the time when we see this issue, it's either caused by background applications or driver/hardware issues. Since I don't have your system logs, it's hard for me to know if your systems are identical, or if they're running the same display driver or background apps. For now, I'd recommend working through our [**Bugsplat & Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure there aren't driver or asset issues causing this.

Let me know if this caused any changed.
